mapper.select: select * from calendar join room on room.ro_pk = calendar.calendar_ro_pk join hotel on room.ro_ho_name = hotel.ho_name where ho_name = #{hotelName} and calendar_date = #{dateStart}

select MIN(calendar.calendar_price) from calendar join room on room.ro_pk = calendar.calendar_ro_pk join hotel on room.ro_ho_name = hotel.ho_name where ho_name = #{hotelName} and calendar_date = #{day} and calendar_count != 0

select room.ro_roomtype, calendar.calendar_price, calendar.calendar_pk, room.ro_ho_name, room.ro_limitperson, room.ro_badtype, room.ro_uploadfile, hotel.ho_check_in, hotel.ho_check_out, room.ro_description from calendar join room on room.ro_pk = calendar.calendar_ro_pk join hotel on room.ro_ho_name = hotel.ho_name
where ho_name = #{hotelName} and room.ro_roomtype=#{roomType} and calendar_date between #{dateStart} and #{dateEnd}
select ro_uploadfile from room where ro_ho_name= #{hotelName}
